title: Grand Duchess Anastasia Nikolaevna of Russia
summary: Grand Duchess Anastasia Nikolaevna of Russia  (Russian: Анастасия Николаевна Романова, tr. Anastasíya Nikoláyevna Románova; 18 June [O.S. 5 June] 1901 – 17 July 1918) was the youngest daughter of Tsar Nicholas II, the last sovereign of Imperial Russia, and his wife, Tsarina Alexandra Feodorovna.
